src:
雅京特区省长Anies Baswedan制定了2020年雅加达特区省级最低工资（UMP），提高33万5776盾或提高8.51％，成为427万6349盾。图为雅加达正在兴建的高层建筑工程的工人正在工作的情景。

02 Nov 2019, 04:17
text:
The governor of the Yajing Special Zone, Anies Baswedan, set the provincial minimum wage (UMP) for Jakarta in 2020, an increase of 335,776 rupiah or an increase of 8.51% to 4.27 million, 4,349 rupiah. The picture shows the workers in the high-rise construction project being built in Jakarta.

02 Nov 2019, 04:17
